name: artscorestudio/product-bundle
description: Product Bundle is a Symfony 2/3 bundle for create and manage products in your Symfony 2/3 application. This package is a part of Artscore Studio Framework.

suggest.select2/select2: Select2 is a jQuery based replacement for select boxes.
suggest.friendsofsymfony/jsrouting-bundle: A pretty nice way to expose your Symfony2 routing to client applications.
